title: Jonathan Klein of Robb Report (and many more)
description:
Jonathan Klein got his start writing for TST but has since gone on to work at Automobile, Robb Report, TopGear.com, and Jalopnik. He rides motorcyles too. On this episode he raves about the Aston Martin DBS Superleggerra, we talk about motorcycles, KTMs, Bugatti drives, Safari suspension, and answer a lot of great buyers questions. 

This show is also available as a video with visual assets to go along with the audio: https://youtu.be/gDZlTE8U_jI

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @jonathan_klein

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @jonathan_klein

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
